content.query:
SELECT trip_data_green_csv.filename() as file_name,trip_data_green_csv.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_green_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE   
    ) 
   AS trip_data_green_csv;
